segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink gushing water like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just polishing her plate, oblivious to the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's soaked, and the puddle's spreading fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, one wrong move and crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just standing there, hand out like she's entitled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone turning off the faucet? This is ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked high, probably gonna get ruined by the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're sneaking cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting back, he's gonna fall for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this mess right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a shame, a simple kitchen turning into a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
